languages.text: "Говорят, Немезит важную шишку обидел, и блюстители рейд готовят на наш отсек. Нужно бежать! Они не станут разбираться, кто виновен!"

traits.locale_text: "Говорят, Немезит важную шишку с верхних палуб обидел, и теперь блюстители рейд готовят на наш отсек. Нужно бежать! Они не станут разбираться, кто виновен, всех перебьют!"

languages.text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"
languages.original_text: "Говорят, Немезит важную шишку обидел, и блюстители рейд готовят на наш отсек. Нужно бежать! Они не станут разбираться, кто виновен!"

traits.locale_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid our compartment. We should flee! They will not bother figuring out who is guilty!"
"I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid our compartment. We should flee! They will not bother figuring out who is guilty!"
"I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid our compartment. We should run! They will not bother figuring out who is actually guilty and who is not!"
"I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid our compartment. We should run! They will not bother figuring out who is actually guilty and who is not!"
"I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"
"I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"

languages.text: "Angeblich hat Nemesit irgendeinem hohen Tier etwas getan, darum bereiten die Enforcers eine Razzia in den Kammern vor. Wir sollten abhauen! Die geben sich bestimmt keine Mühe, erst einmal herauszufinden, wer schuldig ist und wer nicht!"
languages.original_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"

traits.locale_text: Angeblich hat Nemesit irgendeinem hohen Tier etwas getan, darum bereiten die Enforcers eine Razzia in den Kammern vor. Wir sollten abhauen! Die geben sich bestimmt keine Mühe, erst einmal herauszufinden, wer schuldig ist und wer nicht!"

languages.text: «He oído que Nemesitio ha herido a un pez gordo y el personal de seguridad se prepara para el asalto. ¡Tenemos que huir! ¡No van a molestarse en distinguir culpables de inocentes!».
languages.original_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"

traits.locale_text: «He oído que Nemesitio ha herido a un pez gordo y el personal de seguridad se prepara para el asalto. ¡Tenemos que huir! ¡No van a molestarse en distinguir culpables de inocentes!».

languages.text: 「ネメサイトが大物を傷つけたから、エンフォーサーどもがチャンバーを襲撃する準備をしてるって聞いたんだ。逃げた方がいい！奴ら、誰が本当に有罪で誰が無罪なのか、わざわざ調べたりはしないぞ！」
languages.original_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"

traits.locale_text: 「ネメサイトが大物を傷つけたから、エンフォーサーどもがチャンバーを襲撃する準備をしてるって聞いたんだ。逃げた方がいい！奴ら、誰が本当に有罪で誰が無罪なのか、わざわざ調べたりはしないぞ！」

languages.text: “我听说涅墨斯特弄伤了一个大人物，那些执法者正在准备发动袭击。我们应该赶紧一走了之！那些人才不会费心弄清楚谁有罪、谁无罪呢！”
languages.original_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"

traits.locale_text: “我听说涅墨斯特弄伤了一个大人物，那些执法者正在准备发动袭击。我们应该赶紧一走了之！那些人才不会费心弄清楚谁有罪、谁无罪呢！”

languages.text: « Il paraît que Némésite s'en est pris au gratin et que du coup, les prévôts se préparent à lancer l'assaut sur les salles. On devrait s'enfuir ! Parce que m'est avis qu'ils feront pas la différence entre les coupables et les innocents ! »
languages.original_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"

traits.locale_text: « Il paraît que Némésite s'en est pris au gratin et que du coup, les prévôts se préparent à lancer l'assaut sur les salles. On devrait s'enfuir ! Parce que m'est avis qu'ils feront pas la différence entre les coupables et les innocents ! »

languages.text: "Nemezit'in önemli birini vurduğunu duydum. Bu yüzden infazcılar da odalara baskın düzenlemeye hazırlanıyormuş. Kaçmamız gerek! Kimin gerçekten suçlu olup olmadığını ayırmakla uğraşmazlar!"
languages.original_text: "I heard Nemesite hurt a big shot, so the enforcers are preparing to raid the chambers. We should run! They won't bother figuring out who's really guilty and who's not!"
